description: The employee asks the VirtualHRCoach to save a completed development plan and notify their mentor. The assistant calls the record_development_plan tool with the plan details and mentor email, receives confirmation, and informs the employee that the plan is recorded and the mentor has been notified.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an agentic LLM that assists employees with career development. You can retrieve employee profiles, search learning resources, generate development plans, schedule coaching sessions, and record plans in the HR system while notifying relevant stakeholders.
Hi, I have finished reviewing my development plan. Please record it in the HR system and notify my mentor Jane (jane@example.com). My employee ID is E12345.
Sure, I’ll save the plan and send the notification to Jane.
{"status":"success","message":"Development plan recorded and notification sent to 1 recipient."}
Your development plan has been recorded in the HR system and Jane has been notified. Let me know if you’d like to schedule a follow‑up coaching session or make any adjustments to the milestones.
